title: When is Arcade Ahri going to be released?

embed.description: Greetings, Summoners. Welcome to 6.17, the one with a cavalcade of changes to tune things up for Worlds. We've still got one patch after this to make final adjustments, but the conversation now's basically the same as it'll be two more weeks from now.

body:
When is Arcade Ahri coming out? Im really excited for it!!! but...my friend says its not going to be released until patch 6.18... He says. 

"its cause they are having issues with the textures
her tails dont work
is what i read so they said they will release it 100% next patch if not try to release it earlier"

Is this true?

replies.body:
The new arcade skins are slated to launch *during* patch 6.17, so keep your eyes on the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) to see the official announcement when it goes out.

I'm super hyped for that dope Arcade Ezreal skin to be released. As you can tell from my Icon, I'm a pretty big Ezreal fan. :)

Let me know if you have any questions!
I'm dying for the ez skin. He has a sword! heard anything yet targons?
I really hope it comes out todayyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy {{champion:103}}  :D
Im really hyped for the arcade ahri i want to buy her now . SHE JUST LOOK AWESOME . I hope you realease her soon . I cant live withouth this skin {{champion:103}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
She's having a lot of problems with her textures. Her tails don't work and her death screen messes up. I heard she might be released today it I doubt it
Idk, I'm super hype for the skin and am also wondering when it'll be released
